amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by EPA to issue and expand new regulations under RCRA which reflect interpretation of current law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by EPA to issue any regulation that applies to an animal feeding operation, including a concentrated animal feeding operation and a large concentrated animal feeding operation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A083) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A083) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A083) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
